fields.request: Manual QA: Verify EVCS sigil root filters connectors
fields.request_details:
1. Open the Sigil Builder at /admin/sigil-builder/ and locate the EVCS entry in the built-in Sigil roots list.
2. Confirm the EVCS row links to the Charge Point model and lists CHARGER_ID among the available fields.
3. Use the Resolve Sigil tool to evaluate [EVCS.<station_pk>.CHARGER_ID] for a charge point that has no connector ID and confirm it resolves to the serial number.
4. Repeat the lookup with a connector-specific record (connector ID populated) and verify the resolver leaves the token untouched, confirming connectors are excluded from the EVCS root.
